Articles.Content:
I'm using 2.0, and have tried to re install the sub assembly loader to the new version.

I've copied and pasted the plugins and plugins data to the correct folders, but it doesn't seem to load up with the game.

The tab that used to be visible in the VAB has been replaced with the new "flag" tab...

I had no problems re installing mechjeb.

Thanks in advance....
Just replace the .dll with the one from this thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/30696-0-20-Subassembly-Loader-0-20-Compatibility-Patch

if you use the .dll as found in that link above, the subassembly loader icon is replaced by a tiny little question mark icon to the right of the part selection tabs

edit: actually I`ve just found that`s because the temporary update from that link doesn`t come with the icon picture files, but you can transfer those over from your previous install folder and the subassembly loader icon will appear as normal, but in the new location

Edited May 23, 2013 by soranno

On further inspection, the original sub assembly does still work. I just didn't notice that the jigsaw puzzle tab was moved to the almost far left top of the screen, as it's normal position had been replaced by the flag tab.

Appears on my part that the patch is not needed. Thanks for the replies however!
